title: NIH begins review of thousands of delayed research proposals, funding 135 on first day
description: A deal between NIH and groups that sued the Trump administration over delayed DEI-related grant proposals is already bearing fruit
content: A deal between NIH and groups that sued the Trump administration over delayed DEI-related grant proposals is already bearing fruit
